description: WireSock VPN Client redefines high-performance VPN solutions for Windows with its sophisticated command-line WireGuard interface. This client excels in delivering advanced features such as selective application tunneling and a unique default NAT mode, enabling tunnel operations by non-Admin users—a significant enhancement over the standard WireGuard client. Designed for seamless integration, WireSock also offers a virtual network adapter mode for effortless VPN integration. Its standout features include remarkable high-speed connectivity, an ultra-lightweight footprint, compatibility with Windows 10 Mobile Hotspot, and an innovative SOCKS5 Proxy Handshake feature designed to bypass Wireguard restrictions in certain environments. This combination of advanced functionality and user-friendly design makes WireSock an ideal VPN solution for a wide range of users.
author: Vadim Smirnov
